about.title: About Me
description: I'm a Informations Systems student at Unisinos with experience in full-stack development and freelance work.
I'm passionate about problem-solving and working on creative applications.
I'm adaptable, a quick learner, and comfortable working both independently and in collaborative team environments.
about.resumeDescription: I am a Information Systems student at Unisinos, currently in my 5th semester with an expected graduation in 2026. I am seeking a challenging position as a developer where I can apply my problem-solving skills while expanding my experience through a fresh professional perspective.
about.resumeDescription2: I am adaptable, a quick learner, and feel comfortable working both independently and in collaborative team environments. With experience as a freelance developer and in technical support, I have developed strong skills in programming, problem-solving, and communication with the end user.
about.skill1Description: I have experience in building standalone applications and integrated modules, with a focus on detail and user experience.
about.skill2Description: I provide troubleshooting, installations, and technical assistance for software applications, ensuring smooth operation and user satisfaction.
about.skill3Description: I create responsive and dynamic websites using modern technologies, ensuring a seamless user experience across devices.

professionalExperience.title: IT Assistant | Roofing projects Admin
roleFunctions: Supported IT operations, ensured internal tool functionality.
Developed multiple automations with Zapier to connect internal tools and customer CRMs, allowing for a more efficient workflow.
Provided technical support for the Admin team, assisting with software installations, automation maintenance, and documentation.
Managed documents (contacts, invoices and estimates), CRMs, email inboxes, schedules and materials for construction projects.
Worked with contractor's leads from the first contract to the final payment, ensuring schedules and documents were up to date.

professionalExperience.title: Freelance Developer
roleFunctions: Developed standalone visual applications and integrated modules for streamers.
Designed dynamically animated characters and their interactions with streamers' hardware (keyboard, mouse, microphone, joysticks, etc.).
Maintained detailed documentation and high organization in my software.
Managed the entire development cycle as a freelancer, from client communication, requirement gathering, and sales, ensuring client satisfaction.

professionalExperience.title: Technical Support
roleFunctions: Provided technical support for a suite of POS (Point of Sale) applications by Veloce, handling troubleshooting, installations, documentation, and technical requests.
Provided training and support to new user teams, including sales, and administrative staff.
Collaborated with development team to resolve issues and improve the supported product's functionality.
